QuestData.Title: Dreadsaber Mastery: Becoming a Predator
QuestData.Description: If you've hunted with Hemet before, you know that he's tested his skill against many large cats, but the dreadsabers here in Sholazar are different. They're able to bring down larger game than I've ever seen a cat hunt. To overcome and kill such a predator is the mark of a true hunter.$B$BIf you seek to prove you're up to the challenge, test yourself against the dreadsabers. They live in the wilderness surrounding the camp and south of the river.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 15 Dreadsabers and return to Buck Cantwell at the Nesingwary Base Camp.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you tested your skills against the dreadsabers?
QuestData.RewardText: Well, you've proven yourself a capable hunter, but how are you as a tracker?
